name: thedata.nz
tagline: Cool graph, where do I get the data?
body:
### What?
We are the open data source for people answering our country's toughest questions.

### Why?
We are sick of downloading CSVs and making them ready for analysis. As users of data, it is incumbent on us to lead by example and demonstrate good practice.

### How?
On the supply side, we will work with government agencies to help them open up data for the good of all. This means sharing resources that help agencies up-skill and close the resourcing gap between "we made some data" and "you can have it".

On the demand side, we will build tools for a wide variety of use cases and software. Data cannot answer your tough questions if you need unfamiliar tools to get it.

### Who?
Started by @shaunmcgirr, ready for you to join.

### Contact
Check out our [Twitter](https://twitter.com/thedatanz)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
